headline: Maveric Systems Recognised as a Major Contender in Everest Group PEAK Matrix® 2025 Assessments
summary: Maveric Systems, a niche banking and financial services technology specialist, announced that it has been recognised as a Major Contender in Everest Group's Banking IT Services PEAK Matrix® 2025 and Payments IT Services PEAK Matrix® 2025 assessments.

content.title: Maveric Systems Recognised as a Major Contender in Everest Group PEAK Matrix® 2025 Assessments
content.summary: Maveric Systems, a niche banking and financial services technology specialist, announced that it has been recognised as a Major Contender in Everest Group's Banking IT Services PEAK Matrix® 2025 and Payments IT Services PEAK Matrix® 2025 assessments.

thumbnail.caption: Maveric Systems named a Major Contender in Everest Group's Banking IT Services PEAK Matrix® 2025 as well as the Payments IT Services PEAK Matrix® 2025

headline: Vulcan Value Partners’ Investment Journey with Everest Group Ltd. (EG)
summary: Investment management company Vulcan Value Partners recently released its fourth-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. All the strategies of Vulcan Value Partners delivered positive results in the year. The Large Cap Composite (Net) returned -1.5% in Q4 and 7.9% YTD, the Small Cap Composite (Net) gained 3.2% in Q4 and 9.5% […]

headline: Oversight Recognized as a Pioneer in the Emerging Finance Risk Intelligence Category, According to Everest Group
summary: Oversight, the global leader in AI-powered spend monitoring and financial audit technology, today announced its alignment with new research from Everest Group. The report, Finance Risk Intelligence (FRI): Defining the Future of Risk Management in Finance and Accounting (F&A), identifies FRI as a critical evolution beyond traditional, retrospective financial controls, and recognizes Oversight as a pioneer in delivering the platform foundation to operationalize it at scale.

content.title: Oversight Recognized as a Pioneer in the Emerging Finance Risk Intelligence Category, According to Everest Group
content.summary: Oversight, the global leader in AI-powered spend monitoring and financial audit technology, today announced its alignment with new research from Everest Group. The report, Finance Risk Intelligence (FRI): Defining the Future of Risk Management in Finance and Accounting (F&A), identifies FRI as a critical evolution beyond traditional, retrospective financial controls, and recognizes Oversight as a pioneer in delivering the platform foundation to operationalize it at scale.

thumbnail.caption: Oversight logo. Founded in 2003, Oversight is a leading provider of AI-powered spend monitoring and financial audit technology that identifies and prevents fraud, waste and abuse in enterprise spend programs. (PRNewsfoto/Oversight)
